WorkItem.Description: The calculation of the crit-value of agility is wrong. (Hunter) For details please look at the attached picture.
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Crit Bonus from Agility is Off

Comments.Message: Please attach file where you see this issue

But I still have the file already attached!?

http://rawr.codeplex.com/Project/Download/AttachmentDownload.ashx?ProjectName=Rawr&WorkItemId=18562&FileAttachmentId=3915
I see. I have no specific file. Import just any hunter from the arsenal. E.g. http://eu.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Dun+Morogh&cn=Fydelo

I'm sorry, we really can't help you without you giving us the information we need. It may seem weird to you, but we really do need the things we ask for, in order to solve the issue.

Please attach the character file demonstrating your issue.

As I said: I have no file. I do not need help. I wanted to help you. But if you are unable or unwilling to verify a calculation error which one you served on a silver platter that is ok for me.

Good night.

/facepalm

Dude when I load your character, you have already changed your gear from what's in that picture. How do you expect me to reproduce your exact issue without YOUR information at the TIME THE ISSUE OCCURRED. This is why we ask for the file.

I don't know where you are getting this -192/125 from yet, but I'm looking into it. I'd guess that since the /125 is half of the 250 you multiple both of those by 2 for 384/250 which would lead me to believe that the formula you actually wanted to convery (but did a really bad job of comparing it in your image) was 'Crit = (AGI * 3 - 384) / 250' which would imply that the first 384 Agility doesn't give Crit. But I have no source to back that up right now.

Whether you want to call it helping you, or helping us, that doesn't matter. If you want us to be able to identify and fix the issue you think you're seeing, we need more info from you. That means *post a frelling character file that reproduces the issue*.
Scratch part of that last part with first 384. Can anyone confirm (with quoted source) that the base agi doesn't give crit?
Scratch part of that last part with first 384. Can anyone confirm (with quoted source) that the base agi doesn't give crit?
